title: ABBA - Ring, Ring (Video)
description:
Now Remastered in HD! Up to 4K!

Listen to more music by ABBA: https://abba.lnk.to/musicID

Follow ABBA:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ABBA/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abba/

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@abba 
Read More About ABBA: http://www.abbasite.com/

Video produced by: Lasse Hallström

Lyrics:

I was sitting by the phone 
I was waiting all alone 
baby by myself 
I sit and wait and wonder about you 
it’s a dark and dreary night 
seems like nothing’s going right 
won’t you tell me honey 
how can I go on here without you 
yes, I’m down and feeling blue 
and I don’t know what to do, oh-oh 

Ring, ring 
why don’t you give me a call 
ring, ring 
the happiest sound of them all 
ring, ring 
I stare at the phone on the wall 
and I sit all alone impatiently 
won’t you please understand the need in me 
so, ring, ring 
why don’t you give me a call 
so, ring, ring 
why don’t you give me a call 

You were here and now you’re gone 
hey did I do something wrong 
I just can’t believe that I could be 
so badly mistaken 
was it me or was it you 
tell me, are we really through 
won’t you hear me cry 
and you will know that my heart is breaking 
please forgive and then forget 
or maybe darling better yet, oh-oh 

Ring, ring 
why don’t you give me a call 
ring, ring 
the happiest sound of them all 
ring, ring 
I stare at the phone on the wall 
and I sit all alone impatiently 
won’t you please understand the need in me 
so, ring, ring 
why don’t you give me a call 
so, ring, ring 
why don’t you give me a call

(Benny Andersson, Björn Ulvaeus, Stig Anderson, Neil Sedaka and Phil Cody)
© 1973 Polar Music International AB
Published by: Universal/Union Songs AB

#ABBA

meta_keywords: ABBA, Ring Ring, HD video, music video, ABBA remastered, 4K, ABBA greatest hits
new_description:
ABBA - Ring, Ring: A Classic Remastered

ABBA, the legendary Swedish pop group, continues to captivate audiences worldwide with their timeless music. One of their early hits, "Ring, Ring," has been remastered and is now available in stunning high-definition, up to 4K quality. This video showcases ABBA at the height of their creative powers, and it’s a joy for fans new and old.

The Birth of a Hit

"Ring, Ring" was originally released in 1973 and became a significant stepping stone that paved the way for ABBA’s later global success. Written by Benny Andersson, Björn Ulvaeus, Stig Anderson, and with contributions from Neil Sedaka and Phil Cody, this catchy tune captured the tumultuous emotions of waiting anxiously for a loved one's call. The song was initially aimed at competing in the 1973 Eurovision Song Contest, but it was only a few years later that ABBA would find Eurovision glory with "Waterloo."

Video Production and Concept

The video for "Ring, Ring" was directed by the renowned filmmaker Lasse Hallström, who worked on many of ABBA's videos. Known for capturing the essence of the group’s charm and charisma, Hallström’s vision brought the song's emotional narrative to life. The band’s vibrant performance is complemented by playful visuals, reflecting the optimistic yet yearning tone of the song. With its 2023 remaster, viewers can now enjoy a clearer, more vivid representation of ABBA's artistry.

Remastering for a New Generation

Technology has brought us the beauty of remastered content, allowing classic videos like "Ring, Ring" to be enjoyed in pristine quality. The process involved enhancing the original video elements, ensuring that the colors are more vibrant and that the sound quality aligns with today's high standards. This effort aims to introduce ABBA's music to new fans and reignite the passion of lifelong followers. With the ability to stream the video in up to 4K, the details of the performance are sharper than ever.

The Lyrical Journey

The lyrics of "Ring, Ring" articulate a universal theme of longing and anticipation. They tell the story of waiting for a significant other to call, capturing both vulnerability and hope. The repetition of "Ring, ring," throughout the song, is both a plea and an expression of desire for communication and reassurance. ABBA's knack for turning personal emotions into catchy pop anthems is evident here, making "Ring, Ring" a song that resonates on multiple levels.

ABBA’s Unforgettable Impact

ABBA's contributions to music go beyond their chart-topping hits. Their influence is seen across various music genres and generations of artists. The nostalgia for ABBA's era is palpable, yet their music remains timeless. Tracks like "Ring, Ring" are not just songs from the past; they are an invitation to explore the rich tapestry of ABBA’s discography.

Continuing ABBA’s Legacy

Leveraging social media platforms, ABBA has successfully maintained a connection with their audience. Fans can follow them on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok to stay updated with the latest releases and exciting insights into the band's journey. Additionally, official sites and streaming platforms provide comprehensive resources for those keen to delve deeper into the world of ABBA.

Conclusion

The remastered release of "Ring, Ring" not only commemorates ABBA's illustrious history but also celebrates their ongoing presence in today’s pop culture landscape. As one explores ABBA’s music, the seamless blend of memorable melodies, sincere lyrics, and captivating performances reveals why they remain icons of musical excellence. Dive into the nostalgic joy of "Ring, Ring" and experience ABBA like never before—now in brilliant HD.

Explore more about ABBA and their music via the links provided in the video description.
